DOC.brief_title: Experimental Headache Induced Vasoactive Intestinal Polypeptide
DOC.detailed_description: We hypothesize infusion VIP may induce headache healthy subject VIP induce headache may associate dilatation intra- extracerebral blood vessel . To test hypothesis , perform double blind placebo control crossover study normal human volunteer study effect headache cerebral well hemodynamic parameter . In double-blind , placebo-controlled , crossover design , subject randomly allocate receive 8 pmol/kg/min VIP placebo ( isotonic saline ) 25 min . Headache intensity , Mean velocity blood flow middle cerebral artery ( VmeanMCA ) , superfical temporal artery diameter , PetCO2 , adverse event vital sign record T-10 , T0 every 10 min 120 min start infusion . Single photon emission computerize tomography ( SPECT ) perform T-0 , T20 T60 .
